advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.didnt_ask_how_: Didn't Ask How Big The Room Was!
Kill a mob with a large fireball
advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.i_cast_fire_ch: Throw a Fire Charge at a mob and set them ablaze
advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.literal_wither: Defeat the Wither whilst flying with an Elytra the whole time
advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.orphan_obliter: Kill every baby variant of hostile and neutral mobs
advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.stay_mad.title: Stay Mad
advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.stay_mad.descr: Defeat a boss while it is enraged
advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.tinnitus.title: Tinnitus
advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.tinnitus.descr: Stun a Warden by getting its Sonic Boom to hit a bell
advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.unplugged_life: Kill the Ender Dragon with an End Crystal explosion
advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.warden_of_noth: Defeat the Warden guarding the Ancient City
advancement.mob-ai-tweaks.wombo_combo.de: Hit your own Fire Charge with a Wind Charge and create a massive explosion
enchantment.mob-ai-tweaks.after_burner.d:
Right clicking the air with a Flint and Steel shoots a small fireball
Level 2 and above shoots a large fireball instead that increases in explosion power per level
However, cool down lasts longer to compensate the damage it can do
enchantment.mob-ai-tweaks.auto_loading_h: Crossbows reload themselves when not held
enchantment.mob-ai-tweaks.despise.desc:
Tridents will home into the mob the user is looking at
Thrown tridents will glow to indicate they are homing
enchantment.mob-ai-tweaks.featherweight_: Arrows shot from this crossbow are not affected by gravity
enchantment.mob-ai-tweaks.full_auto_retr:
Allows crossbows to fire continuously when right click is held down
Note: for some reason this is not functioning on Forge
enchantment.mob-ai-tweaks.grappling_bobb:
Fishing rods become grappling hooks!
Warning: broken on modded fishing rods, use at your own risk!
enchantment.mob-ai-tweaks.kick_back.desc:
Hitting a mob while in the air launches you upward and reduces your trident's wind up time
Wind charge jumping can also trigger the latter effect
enchantment.mob-ai-tweaks.recall.desc:
Right clicking while holding this compass will teleport its user back their spawn point
If this compass is bound to a lodestone, teleport to that lodestone instead
enchantment.mob-ai-tweaks.withering_muni:
Arrows shot from this crossbow are converted to wither skulls
Special ammunition become charged wither skulls that home into enemies
Wither skulls heal the user by 20% of their max health per hit
mob-ai-tweaks.sniffer_found_biome: %s has found a biome relating to this item!
mob-ai-tweaks.sniffer_found_block: %s has found a block relating to this item!
mob-ai-tweaks.sniffer_found_no_biome: %s has found no biome relating to this item...
mob-ai-tweaks.villager_friend_has_no_foo: Your villager friend, %s is out of food...
